content: X-PT 2 Pole Tool Assembly (DX 2) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for tools- ### FEATURES:Features Fasten conveniently overhead applications safely from the floor No need for ladders or scaffolding Adjustable lengths to suit room height (up to approx. 5 m) Applications Extension system for DX tools to make overhead fastenings to ceilings ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with (tools): DX 2 Technical Data | For use with (tools) | DX 2 ### ITEMS- 3531510 - X-PT 2 Pole Tool Assembly (DX 2) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Pipe section X-PT 3 - 1x Receptacle X-PT 2 packed - 1x X-PT Grip section
